remarks: The functionalized composition operation is a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
comfffn.o $e |- O = ( comf ` C ) $.
comfffn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
comffn.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
comffn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
comffn.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
comffn.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
comffn $p |- ( ph -> ( <. X , Y >. O Z ) Fn ( ( Y H Z ) X. ( X H Y ) ) ) $.
